TEXT.TITLE: OHIO DIRECT HOGS UP 1.00 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: Barrow and gilt prices gained 1.00 dlr on moderate to good demand. Top 51.25 dlrs per cwt. COUNTRY AT PLANT U.S. 1-2 210-240 49.25-50.00 50.00-51.25 U.S. 1-3 240-260 48.25-49.00 49.00-50.25 actual receipts yesterday 10,800 estimated receipts today 6,500 actual week ago 8,800 actual year ago 9,100 week to date estimates 17,300 actuals week ago 18,400 actuals year ago 19,100 Reuter
